name: Pong+ (BlazeGame)
description:
"Score 10 to win."

This web game is just the demo of actual game.

The actual game is downloadable file given in the page.

SHORT DETAIL:-

The game is given with different power ups.

You can play it with AI or friends but in same device.

LEVEL :-

There is six levels in single player mode.

Defeat AI to unlock next level.

Score 10 points to win AI level.

OPTION SETTING:-

There is different score range and ball speed range which is only applied to simple levels (without power ups).
